laws.name: Natural Person
laws.description: Refers to a human being.

laws.name: Pedestrian
laws.description: Any person afoot or using a wheelchair/conveyance propelled by human power (excluding bicycles).

laws.name: Vehicle
laws.description: Device capable of moving on public highway (Excludes golf carts, bicycles, mobility scooters).

laws.name: Motor Vehicle
laws.description: Refers to a vehicle that is self-propelled.

laws.name: Commercial Vehicle
laws.description: Vehicle used primarily for transportation of commodities, freight, animals, or passengers for hire.

laws.name: Peace Officer
laws.description: Full-time, commissioned officer authorized to enforce criminal laws of San Andreas.

laws.name: Drifting
laws.description: Intentional oversteer causing loss of traction while maneuvering in a turning direction.

laws.name: Sabotage
laws.description: Intentional injury or interference with management/control of any commercial or building enterprise.

laws.name: Identity Theft
laws.description: Knowingly obtaining/using identification of another with intent to commit a crime.

laws.name: Threats to Bomb/Injure
laws.description: Unlawful threat to bomb or injure property/public assembly, or communicating false info.

laws.name: Telephone Harassment
laws.description: Intent to harass/torment using lewd language or anonymous/repeated calls.

laws.name: Failing to Summon Assistance
laws.description: Failure to call for help when present during a crime resulting in substantial bodily harm.

laws.name: Carrying Firearms
laws.description: Carrying a concealed pistol without a license. License must be displayed on demand.

laws.name: Unlawful Firearms/Parts
laws.description: Possession of machine guns, short-barreled shotguns, or conversion parts. Contraband.

laws.name: Alteration of ID Marks
laws.description: Removing or obliterating manufacturer name/serial on a firearm.

laws.name: Aiming or Discharging
laws.description: Aiming at human beings or willfully discharging in public/endangered places.

laws.name: Murder 1st Degree
laws.description: Premeditated intent to cause death, extreme indifference to life, or killing during major felony.

laws.name: Murder 2nd Degree
laws.description: Intent to kill without premeditation, or killing during any other felony.

laws.name: Manslaughter 1st Degree
laws.description: Recklessly causing the death of another person.

laws.name: Manslaughter 2nd Degree
laws.description: Criminal negligence causing the death of another person.

laws.name: Assault 1st Degree
laws.description: Intent to inflict great bodily harm using firearm/weapon or force.

laws.name: Assault 2nd Degree
laws.description: Intentionally assaulting another and recklessly inflicting substantial harm or using deadly weapon.

laws.name: Assault 3rd Degree
laws.description: Assaulting protected persons (LEO, FD, Medical, Transit) or negligent injury with weapon.

laws.name: Assault 4th Degree
laws.description: Simple assault not amounting to 1st, 2nd, or 3rd degree.

laws.name: Drive-by Shooting
laws.description: Recklessly discharging firearm from a motor vehicle creating risk of death/injury.

laws.name: Burglary 1st Degree
laws.description: Entering building with intent to commit crime while armed or committing assault.

laws.name: Residential Burglary
laws.description: Entering a dwelling with intent to commit a crime.

laws.name: Burglar Tools
laws.description: Possession or making of tools designed for burglary with intent to employ them.

laws.name: Theft 1st Degree
laws.description: Theft of property/services > $5,000 or taken from a person.

laws.name: Theft 3rd Degree
laws.description: Theft of property/services <= $750.

laws.name: Possession Stolen Vehicle
laws.description: Possessing a stolen motor vehicle.

laws.name: Taking Vehicle 1st Degree
laws.description: Taking vehicle without permission to alter, sell, or export.

laws.name: Robbery 1st Degree
laws.description: Robbery while armed, inflicting injury, or against a financial institution.

laws.name: Organized Retail Theft
laws.description: Retail theft > $750 committed with an accomplice.

laws.name: Obstructing LEO
laws.description: Willfully hindering, delaying, or obstructing any LEO in official duties.

laws.name: Disarming LEO/CO
laws.description: Removing or depriving an officer of their weapon/firearm.

laws.name: Resisting Arrest
laws.description: Intentionally preventing or attempting to prevent a lawful arrest.

laws.name: False Statement
laws.description: Knowingly making a false or misleading material statement to a public servant.

laws.name: Harming Police Dog
laws.description: Maliciously injuring or killing a K9 or detection dog.

laws.name: Disorderly Conduct
laws.description: Abusive language, disrupting assemblies, or obstructing traffic.

laws.name: False Reporting
laws.description: Initiating false reports of emergencies likely to cause evacuation or alarm.

laws.name: Legend Drugs Fraud
laws.description: Obtaining prescription drugs via fraud, forgery, or false names.

laws.name: Drug Manufacturing/Delivery
laws.description: Unlawful manufacture, delivery, or possession with intent to deliver.

laws.name: Drug Possession
laws.description: Possession or public use of controlled substance without prescription.

laws.name: Malicious Explosion
laws.description: Destroying property or structures via explosives.

laws.name: Registration Required
laws.description: Operating vehicle without current registration or displaying plates.

laws.name: Driving Without License
laws.description: Driving on highway without a valid license.

laws.name: Driving While Invalidated
laws.description: Driving while license is suspended or revoked.

laws.name: Lights Required
laws.description: Failure to display headlights/signals during sunset-sunrise or low visibility.

laws.name: Hit & Run (Injury/Death)
laws.description: Failure to stop and remain at scene of accident involving injury/death.

laws.name: Attempting to Elude
laws.description: Willful failure to stop and reckless driving while eluding a LEO vehicle.

laws.name: Speeding
laws.description: Exceeding posted limits or driving at unsafe speeds for conditions.

laws.name: Reckless Driving
laws.description: Driving in willful or wanton disregard for safety of persons/property.

laws.name: DUI
laws.description: Driving under influence of alcohol (>0.08%), Cannabis (>5.00 THC), or drugs.

laws.name: Street Racing
laws.description: Comparing or contesting relative speeds on public highway.

laws.name: Illegal Parking
laws.description: Parking on sidewalks, intersections, near hydrants, or prohibited zones.

laws.name: Electronic Device Use
laws.description: Using personal electronic device while driving.

laws.name: Reckless Burning
laws.description: Knowingly causing fire/explosion endangering forestlands.

laws.name: Illegal Dumping
laws.description: Dumping solid waste without permit onto ground or into waters.

laws.name: License Required
laws.description: Hunting, fishing, or taking wildlife without recreational license.

laws.name: Unlawful Fishing 1st Degree
laws.description: Taking 2x bag limit or using prohibited methods (gaffs, snares, stones).

laws.name: Loaded Firearm in Vehicle
laws.description: Carrying loaded rifle/shotgun in motor vehicle or ORV.
